attributes.action: Provide guidance on how best to respond when witnessing an act of violence, property damage or similar in a public place as the authorities rarely respond promptly and individuals are left unaccountable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In particular, our communities are now becomming more and more subject to the terror of children and adults who do not take responsibilty for their actions. Parents are unwilling to repremand their children and increasingly look to defend them unconditionally and sometimes violently. Let decent people have rights of protection and the power to intervene for  the good of their communities.
